descriptions.400: Oops, the request format wasn't quite right. But hey, mistakes happen! Take a breath, fix it up, and try again when you're ready.
descriptions.401: You'll need to sign in to see this content. No worries though - grab your credentials and come back whenever you feel like it.
descriptions.402: This content requires payment to access. Take your time deciding if you want to subscribe. No pressure!
descriptions.403: Access to this area is restricted. That's alright! There's plenty of other content to explore. Take it easy.
descriptions.404: Hey, the page you're looking for isn't here. But that's okay! Why not take a moment to relax? No need to rush.
descriptions.405: That HTTP method isn't allowed here. Easy fix though - just try a different approach when you're ready. No stress!
descriptions.406: The format you requested isn't available. But don't worry about it! Try another format or just kick back for a bit.
descriptions.408: The request took a while and timed out. It happens! Maybe the network was slow. Take a break and try again later.
descriptions.409: There's a small conflict with the request. No big deal - refresh the page when you're ready and it should sort itself out.
descriptions.410: This content has been permanently removed. That's okay though! Sometimes things change. Let's find something else to look at.
descriptions.413: The data you sent is a bit too large. No worries! Just trim it down a bit and resend whenever you feel like it.
descriptions.429: Whoa there, you're making too many requests! Take a breather. Relax for a moment, then try again. Everything will still be here.
descriptions.500: The server's taking an unexpected rest. These things happen! Our team is on it. Meanwhile, why not take a break too?
descriptions.502: The gateway is having issues connecting. It'll be back soon! Take this as a sign to relax for a moment.
descriptions.503: The service is unavailable right now, probably taking a well-deserved nap. Check back later when you're ready!
descriptions.504: The gateway timed out while connecting. No rush though - give it some time and try again when you feel like it.
descriptions.default: Hey, the page you're looking for isn't here. But that's okay! Why not take a moment to relax? No need to rush.

footers.400: Fix it when you're ready, no rush
footers.401: Grab your credentials and come back
footers.403: Plenty of other things to explore
footers.404: Just taking it easy, one page at a time
footers.409: Small bumps make the journey interesting
footers.410: Sometimes things move on, and that's okay
footers.429: Slow down and enjoy the moment
footers.500: Even servers need a break sometimes
footers.504: Patience is a virtue, after all
footers.default: Just taking it easy, one page at a time
